faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About TravelTang
faq.description: Have another question? Contact our AI assistant or email us.

items.title: What services does TravelTang provide?
items.description: TravelTang offers comprehensive travel support for international visitors to China, including detailed PDF guides for WeChat Pay and Alipay setup, city-specific travel guides, and a 24/7 AI assistant for travel-related questions.

items.title: How can I access the payment setup guides?
items.description: After purchasing our service, you'll receive immediate access to our detailed PDF guides that walk you through setting up WeChat Pay and Alipay on your phone, including verification processes and troubleshooting tips.

items.title: What cities do your travel guides cover?
items.description: Our travel guides cover major Chinese cities including Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, Xi'an, and many more. Each guide includes local attractions, transportation tips, food recommendations, and cultural insights.

items.title: How does the AI travel assistant work?
items.description: Our AI assistant is available 24/7 through our chat interface. It can answer questions about transportation, attractions, local customs, and provide real-time assistance for your travel needs in China.

items.title: Are the guides regularly updated?
items.description: Yes! We regularly update our guides to ensure accuracy, including changes in payment systems, transportation options, attraction details, and local regulations.

items.title: Can I use the service before arriving in China?
items.description: Absolutely! We recommend accessing our guides before your trip to prepare everything you need, especially setting up payment apps and planning your itinerary with our AI assistant's help.
